project.name: Ant sensors test
project.description: Provides sample Ant sensor tasks for each sensor bundled in the release.

target.name: test.sensors
target.description: Tests all sensors with test data.

target.name: test.junit.sensor
target.description: Sends UnitTest data to Hackystat using the JUnit sensor.

target.name: test.emma.sensor
target.description: Sends Emma coverage data to Hackystat using the Emma sensor.

target.name: test.checkstyle.sensor
target.description: Sends Checkstyle CodeIssue data to Hackystat using the Checkstyle sensor.

target.name: test.pmd.sensor
target.description: Sends PMD CodeIssue data to Hackystat using the PMD sensor.

target.name: test.findbugs.sensor
target.description: Sends FindBugs CodeIssue data to Hackystat using the FindBugs sensor.
